room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: We did the museum heist room and it was tons of fun! Lots of things to unlock and discover. Had a great time and lots of laughs!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: We had an awesome time solving the mystery! Brianna and Ben did an amazing job helping us navigate our way through it! Highly recommend the adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: The room was a lot of fun and Brianna was awesome! It was difficult, but we worked together well as a team and Brianna helped a lot.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: For my girlfriend’s 20th birthday we did the Museum Heist room. We had a great time and managed to escape for the 1st time. John was our game manager and did a terrific job. This was our 2nd time at Breakout and we’ll be back again to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: This was my first escape room experience and it was so much fun! We did the Museum Heist with 7 people (including 2 young teenagers). Everyone had fun and there were lots of puzzles to keep everyone busy. It was challenging enough for the grownups and not too challenging for the teens. Our game master was excellent. We finished with 17 minutes to spare. Can't wait to do another room.
